contexts.context: ...far as the mainland," said Harithoel. "I <mark>can't</mark> see the coastline at all. But that's not all....
...have to observe them a little longer. Why <mark>can't</mark> the little fechers swim in straight lines?"
...but will he trade with you after that? You <mark>can't</mark> bargain with a dead man.
...to be tighter than a kwama's ass. You <mark>can't</mark> just stab at every back you encounter and expect...
